member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.Intentions.Bulbs.BulbMenuOnGutterMark
member.summary: In the mode when Editor Appearance option “Action indicator — show in the Action Bar”, Alt+Enter bulb is placed on our custom Glyph Margin (“Action Bar”), and this gutter mark kind represents this glyph.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.Intentions.Explanatory.CodeInspectionWikiProvider
member.summary: Provides bulb items that offer to explain why ReSharper is issuing a particular warning or suggestion.

summary.para: Adds a temporary high-priority layer to allow temporary writes even if most-priority layer is readonly.
It has no availability condition, so it will be available with every binding with the highest priority - for reading values in features.
The settings store bound to an application-wide context, with writes restricted to the temporary layer only.
Reads would go as if in context, which now includes the temp layer. In environments with Project Model, this includes Solution settings.
The live context is bound for the lifetime of this component.

member.summary: The physical storage of the layer created.
